MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG12 postcode area of Annan. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.21am to carry out repairs to broken overhead line equipment at Milnfield and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.04am on Monday 26th October 2020.
